DataElement.preferredName: Prior Hematopoietic Cell Graft Source Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a prior hematopoietic cell product (graft) source or origin was used.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_Healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body._Where something is available or from where it originates.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):Healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body.

Concepts.definition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Tissue or organ transplanted from a donor to a recipient.
Where something is available or from where it originates.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Body tissue, region, surface, cavity, fluid, organ, or collection of organs.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: Indicate if a prior hematopoi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if a prior hematopoietic cell source(s) was (were) used:

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping for CDE:2957398
ReferenceDocuments.description: [IF EXISTS THEN "true" ELSE "false"] SubstanceExtractionAdministrationRelationship.donorTypeCode [prior] WHERE SubstanceExtractionAdministrationRelationship > PerformedSubstanceAdministration > DefinedSubstanceAdministration.nameCode = "Perform Overall Hematopoetic Stem Cell {Transplantation}" AND DefinedSubstanceAdminsitration > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedProcedure [Prior Overall HSCT] > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedProcedure [overall disease treatment] AND DefinedCompsitionRelatoinship.sequenceNumber [Prior Overall  HSCT] IS LESS THAN DefinedCompsitionRelationship.sequenceNumber [Current Overall  HSCT] > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedSubstanceAdministration > PerformedSubstanceAdministration > SubstanceExtractionAdminstrationRelationship.donorTypeCode [current]

DataElement.changeDescription: . Added human readable def. System generated def displayed as alt def. No version needed. AK 1/7/15 Alt names "prior_" removed due to being used on v1.0. AK 7/27/16
